4adabcef3a4e.name: James D Nelson

paragraphs.name: 3d44
paragraphs.text: How can you write something like that which is so sweet and heart touching …from where you get the inspiration ..I wish someone in real is there behind these lines ..looking forward to more such beauties from you …and thanks for sharing with us

At night too;
I sleep in lingerie new
but the bedsheets still reek of you
my eyes, they close
but I still clearly see you
my dreams too
are visions of me and you
every day is the same, as if on cue
life is looping moments of déjà vu
I thought I’d get over you
but clearly, I’m still in love with you.
paragraphs.name: 398c

virtuals.subtitle: И вот лежу, изранен весь, в крови…

content.subtitle: И вот лежу, изранен весь, в крови…

paragraphs.text: Сорвал я розу невзначай любви,

paragraphs.name: 26d7
paragraphs.text: И вот лежу, изранен весь, в крови…

paragraphs.name: 8e62
paragraphs.text: Любовь же, львица, снова стала розой!

paragraphs.name: e323
paragraphs.text: Ты мне не веришь? Что ж, иди, сорви!

paragraphs.name: 40a1
paragraphs.text: Любить как все? Не лучше ли не знать?

paragraphs.name: 521e
paragraphs.text: Great line

this is so sweet!

virtuals.subtitle: So I’d say it takes constantly being in a deep emotional state to be able to write these.

content.subtitle: So I’d say it takes constantly being in a deep emotional state to be able to write these.

paragraphs.name: bfc5
paragraphs.text: Ummm…. never thought about that. Let’s see… quite to the contrary I’d think. Being in love — with love helps. Love has so many facets that being focused only on a break up would perhaps limit one to express sadness — hurt — pain — grief — without expressing the joyful moments — the tenderness — the delicate memorabilia of love.

341e5801f86e.title: Your writing stirs such pure emotion in every piece I read!

paragraphs.text: Your writing stirs such pure emotion in every piece I read! Sometimes I recognize and can identify with the emotions, likely that I’ve been struggling with not knowing what they were, and other times the words prepare me for emotions to come. Thank you for putting your soul out there for us to experience and relate!

c2ae07012379.title: Does it take a heartbreak to write these beautiful pieces ?

paragraphs.name: c977
paragraphs.text: Does it take a heartbreak to write these beautiful pieces ?

virtuals.subtitle:
Every morning;
my breath speaks of mint
but the air I breathe is full of you
my mouth is painted, a strawberry hue
but I can still taste…
